basics.name: N/A
basics.label: Staff Accountant
basics.summary: Professional Accountant and Bookkeeper with 12 years of experience with accounts receivable and payable. Detail-oriented bookkeeping professional with 3+ years experience applying financial and managerial accounting practices.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported Regional Finance Manager with special projects and other responsibilities as assigned. Handled monthly accrual process for 22 expense accounts. Full responsibility for all fixed assets; maintained detailed depreciation schedules. Conducted monthly reconciliations of all balance sheet accounts to ensure their accuracy.
highlights: Monthly analysis of AP process led to an improved aging schedule and 20% increased cash flow.
Streamlined accounting processes and maintained appropriate documentation to improve procedures in accordance with company policies and SOX compliance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked closely under the supervision of the Controller and Director of Accounting. Experience in GAAP accounting and monthly closing processes. Reconciliation of 40 bank accounts on a monthly basis.
highlights: Paid approximately 100,000K in funds via wire transfers to suppliers on a weekly basis.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Implemented the accounting process, policies and procedures in accordance with US GAAP. Bank account maintenance and financial transactions oversight.
highlights: Developed the annual budget and analyzed actual revenue and expenses against the budget.
